website_summaries.verdict: Though it's not large enough for most standard beds, it's a good choice for twin- or kid-size beds. Reasonably priced option that's ideal for curling up on the couch, thanks to the soft dual surfaces.
pros: Plush blanket featuring Sherpa and microfiber sides – both soft and cozy
Great for layering or as a throw
Even looks nice laid across furniture
cons: Tendency to slide around, and may end up on floor when used on a bed
Not quite warm enough for very cold nights

customer_reviews.title: My dog's new favorite thing
customer_reviews.text: My dog is completely obsessed with this blanket. Whenever the blanket it, he is. It's so soft and warm, he loves it, therefore I love it!
customer_reviews.author: NS3000

customer_reviews.title: Soft as a kitten
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on this for a long time, hoping it would go on sale, because I wanted something soft for my rescued kitten to sleep on. I think I like it more than he does, but it really is soft and it makes me want to lie around in bed. I haven't washed it yet, so I don't know how durable it is. It's winter now, and I guess because it's a synthetic fabric, it crackles with static electricity when my kitten walks across it. It's fairly lightweight, but it's warmer than I expected. I'm happy with my purchase, and I think my kitten is, too.
customer_reviews.author: catgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the blanket, the only problem is my dog does too. I will be buying a second one so we don't have to take turns.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Simkin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful throw
customer_reviews.text: Sooo soft and such a rich, deep purple color. LOVE this throw!
customer_reviews.author: cmom

customer_reviews.title: These are cheap substitutes now.
customer_reviews.text: If you ordered one of these in the past and thought you might like another one, you won't. They are half as thick as they were 6 months ago and not nearly as sturdy. Not remotely worth the money any more. Far inferior to the old version.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously comfortable. We bought four of them. They're a great weight and easy to clean. Also, our chihuahua's are crazy about these blankets.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE I.

customer_reviews.title: Horribly cheap!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely cheap and flimsy throw. It is very misleading to call it "Sherpa". I would never recommend this. I will be returning it! If you are looking for a quality, warm throw, this is NOT the one to purchase. If I could give it zero stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra Miller Alldaffer

customer_reviews.title: Quality was disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Found the blanket to be very thin considering it was advertised as plush fleece. Would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: vicki girardin

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: The blanket received did not look like the one shown. The blanket I received did not have the white side to it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Barajas Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blanket! It is super cozy and soft, it is a little heavy but still super comfortable. It very good quality for the price! Covers a twin bed. It had a few creases in it when it came but once I used it a little they went away. The color is very pretty as well. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dorm
customer_reviews.text: Super good! This is what it looks like in a dorm twin XL, I folded it over so I wouldn't have to squish it in between the wall and the mattress. Very soft!!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Love this throw
customer_reviews.text: Love this throw! It's so soft and very warm. Helpful tip about size: We bought the queen size. It is the same dimension as a queen mattress, but it is just a throw, not a comforter. We bought a different one first which was also labeled as queen size, but it was sized to be more like a comforter. That's to say that the comforter style has bigger dimensions so that it would drape down the sides of the mattress, whereas the one being sold here would only cover the top, ending at the edges and not hanging over.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Best blanket ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have to buy a new blanket every winter. This is by far the best 've ever owned Came packaged very nicely would make a wonderful gift. Oversized soft. Cuddly I love this ❤️♥️♥️ great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will fall apart within a couple weeks of owning
customer_reviews.text: If you like to buy junk you should buy this
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Can't stand the synthetic material.
customer_reviews.text: The blanket was true to color, and is very warm, which is great. It is also very soft, but the synthetic materials that are used do not feel good. Only one person in our family can stand the way it feels - and they only like one side of it! So if you are selective about synthetic fabrics because some of them feel 'annoying', or staticy to you, then I would suggest skipping this blanket. Laundering only made the texture issue worse. Some synthetic materials are just not good.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Run your hand over the inside of the blanket. ...
customer_reviews.text: Run your hand over the inside of the blanket. "Ouch and ouch again. Prickly threads spread throughout.
customer_reviews.author: Audis

customer_reviews.title: My pets and son love it
customer_reviews.text: At first I was disappointed because I thought it would be softer and higher quality based on the price and reviews. Ultimately I am happy with the blanket itself, I just think it was overpriced. The sherpa material gets less soft over time, each time you wash and dry it, the sherpa gets more and more "stiff". The microfiber side still feels soft.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: bought it for myself but my kitty loves it more
customer_reviews.text: my cat who is 3 is about the size of a 3 month old cat when I bought this she seemed more comfortable than with any other blanket, 3 months later and many washes later it's starting to show some wear and tear. but that was expected, fact she kneads and sleeps on it daily. for human use its perfect for all year round California weather. if need be I would buy another few in the next few months, the comfort it's provided for my cat is worth it. for the price it's fairly nice made. most likely would hold up longer without my cat's daily use.
customer_reviews.author: DanielleTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Not an electric blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Although this was a nice blanket, when I searched electric blanket this came up. While it is my fault for not reading the entire description it was listed as an “amazon choice” for electric blankets. So now I have to pay to send it back even though I am a prime member.
customer_reviews.author: Michael culpepper

customer_reviews.title: Not like what's pictured
customer_reviews.text: This thing is THIN & feels cheaply made. It looks nothing like the big soft throw pictured in the listing. No padding or batting inside the throw -- just two thin pieces of fake fur & fake fleece stitched together. The color side is very short-napped fake fur (the colored side), and the fleece side is matted & thin -- seriously, matted (which you can see in the pics). Despite that, the fleece is somewhat soft, but the overall quality is not good. If one of my cats hadn't already claimed it as her own (she's a cloth-sucker, and loves anything remotely fuzzy/furry), I'd return it. I've purchased higher-quality, softer, thicker faux sherpas for LESS at freakin' Krogers, guys.
customer_reviews.author: MinorAgentofChaos

customer_reviews.title: Their product photos are misleading.
customer_reviews.text: Large and comfortable but looks nothing like the photos provided. Both on my iPhone and PC the purple is much lighter and brighter, but what I received was completely dark purple. They need to update their product photos
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sherpa too thin
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 6 feet tall so I like the twin size for a throw for watching tv. It keeps you comfortably warm and I love the color. I was disappointed with the quality of the sherpa side. In my opinion the sherpa is only fair quality, you could see through to the blue layer very easily, Our tv blankets get a lot of use and go from chair to couch on a daily basis and the are washed often. I expect a couple of years max of useful wear at my house that's why the 3 stars. If you don't use your throws all the time you will probably be very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Zeelander

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality blanket
customer_reviews.text: Its a throw blanket not good quality not good thickness just a light weight product the inside fuzzy part I unwrapped it and covered myself and the white fuzzy part was all over my pants just not a good quality blanket
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like you'd imagine it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture and is so warm and soft! I like to leave the windows open when I'm in my room, even if it's chilly outside. I've had sherpa blankets before and knew that I wanted one again for the fall/winter. I bought this blanket and it's been worth every penny. This is the absolute best thing to have around you when you're going for that "cold air but warm bed" feel. I have the light blue, which is the exact color in the picture, except that it's a little more shimmery in person because of the velvety texture. Also, I bought the 60x80, which is big enough for more than one person to fit comfortably under.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: It is overpriced. First it is not as big as I thought, it is less than twin size. Also it is thin. I bought in Costco another throw for half of the price but twice as bigger and so much thicker.
customer_reviews.author: svetlana7e

customer_reviews.title: Would be the best if it was durable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blanket. It is cozy, soft, cute, warm and affordable. It is very large (I got a king and there is room to spare) and thick. THE DOWNFALL- after the first gentle cycle wash there are multiple small tears in is. I want this blanket to get 5 stars so bad but it can't. It gets dirty easily because they sherpa side holds in dust so it needs to be washed often but doesn't seem to be very durable. 2 stars because if it doesn't last all the good qualities are worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Sav

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my almost 3 yr old as we live in much colder climate now and he actually has to cover up at night, its warm, very soft and big enough for him to move around underneath it and remain covered. It's so warm and just durable I've washed it in several times and it's still amazing. My 7 yr old daughter loved it to much I had to get one for her too, and then my husband surprised me with one for our bed so I guess you could say this is for sure something everyone will love!
customer_reviews.author: Nory M. Aldama

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look anything like the one shown
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look like anything like the one shown I brought king side gray, and it doesn't look like the piture at all it is false advertising, considering how much I spent it wasn't worth it
customer_reviews.author: Quincy santos

customer_reviews.title: Stunk As Soon As I Opened It
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this blanket due to the number of reviews I’ve seen on it. I was incredibly disappointed that as soon as I opened it, it smelled like old water. It felt damp too. I was surprised because it was sealed air-tight in plastic and there was no water damage to the box. I’m hoping I will like it after I wash it but for now, very disappointed in the condition of the product when received.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Color red gets into the white when u wash
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my kids bed I just received them today and washed them...... all the red got all over the white part making it pink..... what a waste of money... I was so excited with the color and how soft it felt.... stock with pink blankets for my boys
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Lint and fabric peeling
customer_reviews.text: My initial impression was great! I got a king size blue color. I liked the color and comfort. But after the 1st was I saw a lot of lint and fabric peeling. I use Arm & Hammer sensitive skin detergent and wash and dry it separately because of the size. I thought the lint and peeling will gradually reduce but unfortunately the peeling and lint continued in the second wash as well. Those pictures are after the second wash (one with the flash and without flash).
customer_reviews.author: rajitha

customer_reviews.title: Fabric on non-Sherpa side is shiny and cheap looking!
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed when I opened the package for this blanket. I ordered the navy blankets for my son’s and the fabric looks nothing like the photos. It’s shiny and cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: Lori W

customer_reviews.title: Light blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is very light and not helpful if you expect it to keep you warm on cold days. It is also small, so pay attention to the size. I would not buy this blanket again since I was expecting a heavier blanket to keep you warm. Go to Costco and buy one of their throw blankets --- much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Nap alert!
customer_reviews.text: Not planning on taking a nap? Think again with this big bad blanket! Beautiful sheen to the color (we got caramel) and in any size (we got 90x90) it’s a world of possibilities for anyone :) I got this for couch cuddling for two and it’s so VERY soft on both sides. No fuzzes come off on our clothes like other blankets. This blanket has quality for a great price I would gift to anyone and know they would be so happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and really thin
customer_reviews.text: While the blanket is soft, it is extremely thin and not at all like the quality of other Sherpa/fleece blankets I have. I have two from Kohl’s and one from Sports Authority that are much thicker and warmer but they only come in throw size and I wanted one bigger for my son’s night baseball games. So I took a chance online. I ordered a queen with the intent to fold it in half for extra warmth. This thing folded in fourths is as warm as the blankets from Kohl’s so it defeats the purpose for size. I’ll be returning and looking for one at our local stores. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: E. Block

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter came to Mesa for Christmas (it was cold down here) so I made sure she had a blanket to snuggle in. She is 9 and grown past the cutie blanket colors so I got her brown. It's really nice and comfy and easy to wash UPDATE: I washed it for the second time and it completely changed. The white fluff on the underside clumped together and is no longer soft. The blanket came apart and is no longer one piece. I am very disappointed. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: BleuHoney

customer_reviews.title: REAKED of mildew. Cheaper then use to be. Gross don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a DRY box completely damp and REAKED OF MILDEW. Will never purchase again. I’ve ordered one of these in the past and loved it. HATE THIS. It’s flat and a totally cheaper version of the one I have bought before. UPDATE: even after wash TWICE STILL SMELLED OF THAT NASTY MILDEW it’s trash. Waste of money! Want money back!
customer_reviews.author: Gary tagmyer

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy another one
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst blanket I've ever bought. The quality is very cheap, the material is thin, and after washing the sherpa parts feel rough. I bought the emerald green blanket and the color is beautiful. Unfortunately it snags very easily. This blanket was very strange - the sherpa part is sewn to the back of the green part but only along the edges,causing the center to billow about strangely.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S

customer_reviews.title: Very Thin Blanket
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for this type of blanket for a gift, as we have one that we absolutely love (different brand that I couldn't find again) but was very disappointed and ended up returning this. It's very thin and I didn't feel the quality was up to par. I find it hard to believe it would keep you warm on a cold night. On the positive side, it is very soft and the sizing was correct for the queen.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I’m OBSESSED with this blanket. It’s soooo soft. It’s one of those blankets that make you never want to get out of bed. It’s easy to wash as long as you follow the instructions (by itself, hand wash cycle, and cold water) It keeps me warm at night in South Florida where the coldest temperature is 58 at night so if you live anywhere colder you’re going to need a thicker blanket than this one. I’m 26 years old and I treat this blanket like I’m 5 carrying it around all over the house. It looks just like the photo and came in perfect condition. I’m beyond happy!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Blankets are garbage if they ever need to be washed.
customer_reviews.text: These blankets literally fall apart at the seams when washing on gentle cycle and air drying. I have pitched 3 of these blankets before the first wash. I notified the seller but they never bothered to reach to make it right. I now have 3 unusable blankets and I am out over $100. Awful service.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful,soft,coziest blanket ever but....
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful blanket incredibly soft and plush. I got it for my 7 year old granddaughter who fell in love with it sleeps with it every night. Wants to brings it everywhere. But The white Sherpa side is already clumping so not as soft. We haven't washed it yet. She still loves it but" wants it back the other way " We don't know if fluffing it up in cool dryer will help or make it worse. Any suggestions? Update after not even 6 weeks the white Sherpa side has balled up separating and not near as soft as it was. Have not washed yet have been so careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing blanket
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god if you don’t have this you need it! Like for real it’s HUGE, and just what I needed for a throw on my couch! Who hates all those little throws that only cover half your body so wait her your arms are cold or your legs are! Not anymore, ugh this is so soft and I can wrap my self all up so cozy and comfy! Super thick and great quality for price, this will definitely be on my gift list for the holidays, who doesn’t love a blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I bought something off of wish.com 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: This is a $5 blanket at most. As other reviews suggest this company has redesigned this blanket and is no longer a good blanket . Not cool
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Warm, heavy and soft
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is awesome. Got it for my wifey as she's always cold in the family room. It's large enough so that we can both go under there if needed. Nice color of purple (her favorite). Not only is it warm under there from the fleece, it's so soft (to me, it's heavy enough to be warm but it's lightweight; I know that's confusing). Also, I see that the description states that it's reversible; I haven't tried that and I don't think I would since the fleece is so comfy. Very satisfied with it (it's done well during this very cold winter against the winter drafts from the garage and patio door).
customer_reviews.author: CA A.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, cozy blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these (teal and light blue) for my kids' Christmas. They absolutely loved them! They are incredibly soft, very lightweight, but very warm. The colored sides are rich, full colors and the underside is like hugging a cloud. The company sent an email with detailed care instructions, which I appreciated. The only interesting part (confusion point rather than problem) was they were shipped differently. One, in a zipper plastic case, like a sleeping bag, inside a bigger box and the other in a loose bag inside a fitted box. They were ordered at the same time from the same company so that was interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Blanket I've Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: For the relatively low price of this item, I honestly was surprised by its overall quality. It's not a thick blanket, nor puffy and comforter-like in structure - but actually rather thin and light, yet I feel extremely warm and cozy when I sleep under it. Plus it's soft, soft, SOFT - probably the softest, most luxuriant fabric material I've ever felt in my life - as soft and cuddly as a puppy's fuzzy little head! And this includes not only the white Sherpa wool-like material but the purple outer covering of it as well. I sometimes bundle up part of it and use it as a pillow, it's that comfortable and inviting! I'm exceedingly happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Martens

customer_reviews.title: Worst Amazon purchase I’ve made yet!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive this based on reviews I read prior to purchasing. I was expecting a plush, cozy throw to keep on the couch. It’s very thin, cheaply made and has a terrible smell I can’t place. I guess I’ll be letting my cat have it. I’d return it if it weren’t such a hassle. DO NOT BE FOOLED BY THE POSITIVE REVIEWS!
customer_reviews.author: Amber P

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic find
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't looking to purchase a new blanket but I couldn't pass up the price and/or description...amazing. I rcvd it and everything about is a plus, plus. Delivered quickly, packaged well, color-gorgeous but the soft texture is the very best part. Thanks sooo much for a great find & who can ever have enough blankets when you live in the Midwest anyway. Pleased as can be :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Staton

customer_reviews.title: Light but warm!  Luxurious!  Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these blankets from Amazon on special sale. They are light weight but very warm and look luxurious. One was a queen size for a gift. The other two were throws to use in the evening while watching tv. The throw would not be big enough to use on a bed. So soft and silky. Highly recommended. Arrived quickly without incident.
customer_reviews.author: R L Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is so thin. I wish I would not have wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth B

customer_reviews.title: sticky and small
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of my yellow blanket with one side like fleece and the other, Sherpa. The blanket is actually two sewed together to make one. But this blanket really sticks to itself a lot in the dryer. You have to take it out and open it up (pull it apart) a few times during drying, or wet pockets will be there when the drying cycle completes. It's sticky for lots of lint of different colors, too. They are stuck all over the blanket which definitely takes away from the beauty of the yellow. Lastly, it seems rather small - even for a twin.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is very soft and shipped fast (despite our current pandemic). I rated it 4 stars only because I have not washed it yet and don't know how it will hold up afterwards, if it does it would make a great gift and I may come back to purchase a few more. UPDATE: I've since bought 2 more! the colors are so vibrant (teal, purple, and red). i wash them by themselves on a delicate cycle and dry them on low heat. they came out perfect! not even any lint in the lint trap! if u need a nice throw blanket to keep u warm this winter THIS IS THE ONE! so soft, warm, and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost Girls Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Misleading. Not heated. Learned to read. (UPDATE: STILL WAITING ON REFUND MONTHS LATER AND COUNTING)
customer_reviews.text: Searched for heated blanket this came up. Very misleading and expensive for it not to be heated. Not sure what dumb algorithm searchable words are being added here but it is misleading and I will not be keeping it. If you are looking for a regular overpriced fleece blanket though then this is good. Lesson learned here: read and dont assume amazon searches will actually give you what you searched for, it's a business not google. Update it is now Fabruary 15th, I've returned this product months ago and I'm still awaiting a refund. Not holding my breath for one but just overall crap experience here.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Unsure if quality. Long taut strings found throughout fuzzy side of blanket.
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of long taut strings I am finding on the white side of this blanket. I hope it has been sewn properly and isn't going to come apart.... Not what I expected for $42 Update: Seller unconcerned with 2 star review and hasn't reached out to us at all despite the concerns with the blanket quality.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Super warm, soft. Received wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong color, which is why I gave it a 4 star. Ordered the peacock blue but received the light blue. Disappointing but, needed it for a birthday the next day. So I didn’t have time to return/wait for the replacement. Very soft, got it for my step-daughter and she She loves it, other than it not being her fav color. She loves the combo of the silky/ fluffy sides. The blanket is thicker than a typical throw, but not as thick as a comforter, which is just what we wanted. I am concerned about washing; that the fluffy white side will bunch and not stay as fluffy and soft, but I will update after washing.
customer_reviews.author: DKN

customer_reviews.title: LINE DRY ONLY!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Won’t buy again. It was soft and lovely until I washed it. Even on low it melted in spots. It’s completely ruined! Don’t believe people when they say this is dryer safe. It most certainly is NOT!
customer_reviews.author: NurseLoriD

customer_reviews.title: If I wanted a delicate sweater I would have bought one
customer_reviews.text: This product needs to be washed and dried in a delicate setting and needs delicate care. This is really not great for a blanket/throw (which is what I was using it for). Too much care needs to be taken in washing for it to make it a practical gift. A full page of laundering instructions comes with the blanket. It is soft and lightweight and warm. Just not practical. I have another that I bought which is equally as soft and warm and does not need to be handled with kid gloves (same price too!)
customer_reviews.author: MARSP

customer_reviews.title: Best blanket ever! Highly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly the best purchase I’ve made when it comes to comfort. Blanket is big and soft. It came very well packaged I really like how they did it. It’s so soft and very good at keeping a person warm. I wash it with cold water and dry it in no heat. If you sleep on a twin bed best bet you should get the queen sized blanket
customer_reviews.author: Diego Pacheco Flores

customer_reviews.title: I've lost track...
customer_reviews.text: ... how many of these I've purchased. The throws are the perfect size, weight, and softness - my husband and I each have our own and our cats wait for us to get under them before cuddling in our laps during morning coffee time. I purchased a couple more this week to make sure visitors have their own so they won't borrow mine! I got my mother one for her tv chair and a larger one for her bed. She layers it between her sheet and comforter for extra warmth.
customer_reviews.author: tammara

customer_reviews.title: My cat won't let me use my new blanket
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give a more complete review, but unfortunately my cat is completely obsessed with this new blanket and lays on it all the time. Sure, I could just move her, but her love of the blanket is just too adorable. What I do love about the blanket from the brief time I used it is that it is large enough to completely wrap yourself up and keep you warm on the cold days.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa LeBlanc-Williams

customer_reviews.title: not breathable
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is very hot, even when it is really cold. It is not breathable and I almost always wake up wet no matter how cold it is. The colored side is purple and is very soft and silky. The color is bold and beautiful. The white side is soft, but it catches against any small bumps, snagged nails, or calluses on my skin. My dog loves the blanket. It is great for him to burrow and or make a nest in.
customer_reviews.author: student

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly warm!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It has become my BLANKIE!!!!!!! I love it and I have no idea how it is ever going to get washed!!!! BIG GRIN!! Yes I am going through my second childhood and enjoying every moment with my BLANKIE. Linus from PEANUTS has nothing on me. The purple color is gorgeous, so velvety soft. It is light weight and snuggly warm. I sleep under it every night and for my afternoon map. Will make a wonderful gift for any elderly person. Or any person of any age who would enjoy a "BLANKIE".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these a few months ago on lightning deal and gave it to my husband to replace the blanket he had on our couch. He loves this! I borrowed it a few times to and found myself jealous - it's so warm and cozy! So, the next time I saw it on lightning deal I snatched up another for myself. I'll pull out my lighter blankets in the summer again, but these are where it's at for the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: So soft! So cozy! Such a gorgeous color! I have few complaints. This exceeded expectations. It’s warm and looks more expensive than it is. Both sides are soft in different ways, the Sherpa very fluffy and the red a soft microfiber type. You can see “lines” in the red fabric of you look closely at the weave but this doesn’t bother me. I tried to include a good picture of this. The reds in my pictures are a different in person (I think the iPhone camera color corrects or it was the lighting); my first pic is the most true to color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insanely soft, warm blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for money product! Its an extremely cozy blanket, and I have used it in my apartment at temperatures around 65F and it kept me perfectly warm. The only con may be that it restricts airflow so its not of much use during warmer months, but otherwise its a great purchase. I already ordered one more! I have used it for around ≈6 months now and it has held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dipobrato Sarbapalli

customer_reviews.title: Great color on the teal blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the teal color in both twin size and king size. The color is true to the picture - very bright. The twin size came rolled up in it's own container. The king size came vacuum packed and have may have been a return previously. I hope not b/c these are gifts. I did unzip the container and the blanket feels very soft. There is no smell. The price was great. So it is white on the sherpa side and teal on the top side. Now to the sage/green one. Very pale color but otherwise same as above. Again, a gift.
customer_reviews.author: picky senior

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket was bought accidentally, lol. You know how you can put a specific search term in like "twin size electric blanket"? Amazon likes to throw in unexpected items, so if you don't pay attention, you'll order the wrong thing. That's what happened here. However, I'm not upset about it. The blanket is a gorgeous color, very soft with velour on one side and sherpa on the other, and quite warm. It's much less weildy than an electric blanket, so I'm really happy with my "mistake".
customer_reviews.author: LucyLu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fleece Blanket for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted thick blankets for snuggling while movie watching but also to throw over the couch to keep my cat's claws from ruining it. So these blankets were perfect. I ordered the gold/honey color, and it's goes perfect with the accents in my house. I'm ordering two more blankets now. The color side is super soft, and the Sherpa side (white fluffy side) has a soft wooly texture. Remember these are fleece blankets, and fleece is cheap. So if you want a really high quality blanket, don't get fleece.
customer_reviews.author: Leia

customer_reviews.title: Best blankie EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend everyone to get this blanket. You can use it for a throw, or your main blanket, on the couch, cool nights on the porch. My cat also gives it 5 stars he loves it, he kneads it n suckles on it, its adorable but I will be getting him his own lol. Its velvetly smooth on the color side, n then fuzzy soft n warm on the white side. I just love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Very soft/Very thin/warm/buy bigger size
customer_reviews.text: It is very thin. I think I should buy other blanket for winter. Honestly, when I saw it first, I thought that I should return it because it was very thin. However, I just tried it and I was surprised. It is very soft and warm. In terms of size, I ordered queen size but I think it is not enough for 2 people..... As a result, 1. It is very thin. if you live in Minnesota, you should buy other product. (I've lived in Minneapolis in front of Stone arch bridge) 2. but warm. good for late October, November, early December. 3. very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Daehan Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blanket/throw for wintertime family room couch
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a soft throw or blanket to use on the couch in my family room that would cover all of me, including my feet! The other throws that I have are too skimpy. This throw/blanket is perfect! At first it seems light-weight but it really is a very warm blanket. I bought the pale green that is shown in the picture and the color of my blanket matches exactly. I definitely recommend this blanket, especially at such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: tbrown7800

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this blanket it very much and I don’t have any major issues with the product. It’s super soft and will keep you warm all night long! But my issues are that since one side is Sherpa lint, hair, small particles of things can cling on very easily and stay there till you pull them off. Also I hope in the future the company makes a twin extra long version so that I may cover my whole body and still have a little bit extra. Now don’t get me wrong it does cover me but if I want the blanket on my shoulders than my feet will stick out and vice versa, and take into account I’m 6’0.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL THROW!  Don’t pass this one up.
customer_reviews.text: You won’t be sorry about buying this. The things I like the most: 1. Extremely soft yet lightweight. Kind of like a soft, cozy cloud 2. Color is vibrant and the contrast with the sherpa is striking 3. Absolutely no shedding even in the first washing and drying. Nothing left in the washer or dryer or otherwise. One of my best purchases. I’m using it as a throw, and it looks so pretty. Price is affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Bargain shopper

customer_reviews.title: Terrible craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality! It started to fall apart after one wash, by itself, on a normal warm water cycle. It has gradually fallen apart over time and I now use it as a dog blanket. I do not recommend this product! You can find better at any other store. Sloppy craftsmanship
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: cozy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a soft blanket with nice texture to put over my sheets...since my comforter is a more cold feeling fabric. I like the warmth this blanket has without being overly heavy. The fabric feel is soothing. The only thing off is the color.. seems to lean more toward royal blue than teal. Definitely not the color pictured on site.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED WITH THIS BLANKET!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a large fleece blanket for some time now and with Michigan Winter approaching I figured I would invest in this one. I'm so happy I did! It has become my favorite blanket every! Its so incredibly soft and for how thin it is it's surprisingly warm! I got the king size and it fits my king bed perfectly. My whole family is now obsessed with this blanket and my kids keep taking it off my bed! I highly recommend this blanket for anyone looking!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Not Plush
customer_reviews.text: Eh. It's ok, I wish I would have chosen a different blanket. This is very thin and NOT plush. It is soft but not plush at all. If I had the time I would send this back but I purchased this for my granddaughter's birthday which is next week so I pretty much am stuck with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Irvine

customer_reviews.title: In Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with my blanket!!! I bought this when it was a lightening deal because I have wanted a Sherpa blanket for forever. I am so glad I did. It was everything I wanted and more! The color is a deep purple and each side is soft like buttah! It is light weight but keeps me so warm. It is loteru the softest blanket I have ever owned. My dog and husband both love sleeping with it. The king size fits our bed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Soft light blanket that provides incredible warmth
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is so light that at first I thought it wouldn’t be very good at providing warmth. Was I ever wrong. This is a heat magnet! It’s incredible how much it keeps me warm, given that it’s so light and soft. I bought the pink one and it’s a beautiful subtle pink that feels soft and silky. The reverse side is a white fluffy imitation sheepskin that feels soft too. This is a beautiful blanket that would make a great Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: HOWEVER it sheds fleece easily. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfy, HOWEVER it sheds fleece easily. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AceYoung

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is amazing. Not sure about overall durability yet but the color, amazing, the softness, amazing, the warmth, amazing. It's so cool how it keeps the cold out but isn't overly thick. I ordered twin size and it's perfect to use in my recliner not too big not too small like a standard throw is. I haven't washed it yet so again not sure on durability. And it smelled the awful "new" smell when it first came out if the box for a few days but I put febrezee and aired it out and it's fine now. Really love this thing and thinking about ordering another one
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: Specifically bought this because if that extra stitching shown in the pictures... However, mine does not have this... I have the king size just like the pic, yet the stitching is not like the pic.. Just got the twin size for my sofa.. it is soft and warm.. great blanket! The king is holding you so far.. very pleased even though it is diff then the pic.... It also is soft and warm.. perfect for very cold conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Who cares

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: it was definitely a lot thinner and really lightweght compared to my other wool blanket, but it's sup[er soft and comfy!!! Works perfect for these days when my AC blows way too cold and I'm working from home. It also helps me sleep easier! The other blanket I have is super heavy because it's made for winter, but this one is super soft and lightweight and I love it!! Definitely would buy again in other colors and amass a fluffy blanket army!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable fleece blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I received this fleece blanket yesterday and used it last night. I found it incredibly soft and light weight and yet very warm to sleep under. I love this blanket and so did my two cats, and we had plenty of room for all three of us. It was very easy to fold and put away for the day. I also appreciate the seller including directions for the care of this sherpa fleece blanket. I am thinking about ordering this in the smaller throw size as I am sure I would fine plenty of uses for that size also.
customer_reviews.author: ginger

customer_reviews.title: I have never loved a blanket so much
customer_reviews.text: I have never loved a blanket so much!!! This is the SOFTEST warmest yummiest blanket I have ever owned, and I'm a person who loves throw blankets on the couch. I've only had a few weeks, but am surprised at how well it holds up. Love the color, it's rich and pleasant. I highly recommend. Going to be looking at other items this brands sells, if they are anything like this blanket, it'll be worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy H

customer_reviews.title: Go to sleep warm.
customer_reviews.text: This blanket was a gift, although I have used it. It definitely keeps you warm on a chilly day or night. I’m 5’11” and it covers me pretty good. It’s not a bad Christmas gift. Blanket has a decent weight, far from light but you do feel the snug while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Shepard Davis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up to washing.
customer_reviews.text: Washed after opening, and it was fine. But the second time I had to wash it, the stitching came out along the edge and now we have 2 blankets 🤷 Wouldn't recommend washing it more than absolutely necessary, and even then, maybe by hand.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs.one issue
customer_reviews.text: We have a queen size bed but to cover it correctly we needed king size. This covers perfectly. The color hides our dogs hair. It coordinates well with the color are have in the room. And it’s cozy comfy but not too hot. Also washes well. A few months later. Little pieces of the sherpa side get rough. When I take them off they look like melted plastic. The blanket is never exposed to more than low heat of the drier.
customer_reviews.author: Garry L. Skutt

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft throw
customer_reviews.text: Pros: *the purple color is really gorgeous. It's a nice dark purple. *It's very soft. Feels great against your skin. *Affordable price Cons: *I wish it was a little longer for when I stretch my legs out to take a nap. (It's a standard throw size, so I won't count that against my rating.) *It seems a little bit thin. It's not as warm as some of the similar throws I have.
customer_reviews.author: The Haynals

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my niece
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the trend is here but I guess this is popular with girls for some weird reason. Anyway, it was her Christmas gift, it's the only thing she wanted?? About 3 days later I got a text from her Uncle saying the other 2 sisters were trying to sneak it away from her & use it for themselves! LOL! They all love it!!!! Sometimes you just never know what gifts will be a hit but apparently this one was!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Size is not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I love the blanket, but it just seemed small when I got it. It's about 3 inches too short on each side when laying flat. I can stretch the width to the right size but the length is a lost cause. As a tall guy, this is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nehal M

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this blanket. Originally purchased one for my sister for Christmas she loved it. My mom 91 recently hospitalized was so cold but could not move under the weight of heavy blankets. My sister gave her the blanket I had given her and my mom was in love with the softness and the warmth of the blanket. I bought a second blanket to replace my sister’s. Older people get so cold and their skin is so delicate blanket was truly a blessing to my mom especially and to my sister and I as we were so glad she was warm and comfy...thank you for a wonderful product by the way perfect size
customer_reviews.author: GEN

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and great size
customer_reviews.text: Will update review as I use it more in the fall/winter time ! Just a decor now on my bed very soft so beautiful yellow just as the picture/one reviewer posted before me ,she made me go with it instead of another brand I had my eyes on thank goodness 😅it’s an original brand Bedsure Sherpa Blanket very happy with my purchase will buy more colors to match my other sheet set !
customer_reviews.author: Tiny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight, feels luxuriously soft
customer_reviews.text: It feels luxurious and very cozy. It’s the perfect weight to help me sleep (too light and for whatever reason I can’t sleep; too heavy and I feel trapped). I’ve had it for a few weeks and it’s perfect for the late summer air conditioning and the crisp fall evenings with the window cracked. Seems like it’ll be also be great in the winter. My cat loves it, too. He likes to snuggle on it and make biscuits.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fandl

customer_reviews.title: Warm as toast
customer_reviews.text: We have been having some very cold nights in southern California and I really needed something warm for comfortable sleeping. This blanket really fits the bill. It is deceptively light weight, yet very warm and toasty. So soft and warm there is a distinct possibility of oversleeping or just luxuriating in it. So best get up immediately when the alarm goes off. Very, very happy with this purchase😆🛌😀
customer_reviews.author: bevels

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously soft and very warm for its light weight.
customer_reviews.text: My first thought after removing it from the bag was how amazingly soft both sides were. I mean luxuriously soft. Once tucked in, you will not want to get out from underneath it. It's very warm too... Especially considering the light weight. I originally bought it for the living room and wrapping up in my recliner watching TV on those chilly nights. I made the mistake of putting it on my bed first though. May just have to get another for TV watching. The Bedsure Sherpa is a no brainer if you need something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this blanket thinking.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket, thinking it was a ( heated blanket), (I was just happy Xmas shopping on Amazon!) anyways-For a teenager that complained about her room being cold at night, I bought this! Boy was I surprised when this came! For one, it was the Queen sized one, which I should have got for MY bed. It is soft, and gets real warm! I asked for it back-and got a BIG "NO"-so YES! This was a great purchase-If my 17 year old teen loves it-(which does't happen often!) then yes, buy one for YOU or for someone else!
customer_reviews.author: Niccita

customer_reviews.title: The perfect heavy-duty fleece throw blanket
customer_reviews.text: I liked this throw blanket so much that I ordered another. It doesn't shed any of its own fibers in the least and takes just a few minutes in the dryer to dry out. It holds up extremely well to heavy-duty use. To wit, my Great Dane sleeps on top of it on my bed. This throw controls odors and traps fur from the dog. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SB SFO

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it, including 2 of my cats
customer_reviews.text: Very nice color, soft, some weight which I prefer. Washed and dried easily, just follow directions (cold, gentle, dry low). I got it for my husband, both he and 2 of the cats love it. I wasn't sure if I would get another, before I ordered, because I am redecorating my room, but I am, definitely. Also super fast ship and good packaging for a gift, you could wrap it easily.
